head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: Choosing a software package

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: Choosing a software package

body.p: Saxon is distributed in three packages: Saxon-HE, Saxon-PE, and Saxon-EE, each of which is available for both the Java and .NET platforms. Saxon-HE is available under an open-source license (specifically, the Mozilla Public License), and all its features are available to all users. Saxon-PE and Saxon-EE are commercial products and require activation by a license key.
There are also restricted licenses that work with Saxon-EE but restrict its capability:

li.p: The EET license provides schema validation and schema-aware XSLT transformation only (no XQuery)
The EEQ license provides schema validation and schema-aware XQuery only (no XSLT)
The EEV license provides schema validation only (no XQuery or XSLT)

body.p: For a full table showing the features available in each edition and licensing variant, see the feature matrix
For commercial information including prices, terms and conditions, maintenance and upgrade offerings, site licensing, and redistribution licensing, see the online store.
